--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Still carrying cybershark, Hot Rod ran past Feline, and outside.
> "Vehicle mode." He tranformed to car mode, as Cybershark landed in 
the
> passenger seat.
> "Get in Feline!" He yelled.
